item.description:
As an experiment in distancing myself away from US big tech, I'm trying out Linux on my laptop -- and it's surprisingly not-bad once you set it up.

Similar conclusion as the one Federico Viticci arrived at -- since so many good apps these days are just web apps, the "switching cost" is not as high as it used to be!
